quote: RiffRaff didn't give us what we wanted to hear—they gave us what we needed to know. Their fieldwork in Osaka completely changed our product roadmap for Japan.
Most agencies handed us sanitized focus group transcripts. RiffRaff brought back raw voice memos, photos from convenience stores at 2am, and insights we could actually use.
We hired RiffRaff to understand why our Japan launch failed. They spent six weeks in the trenches and came back with answers no consultant ever found. Worth every yen.
Finally, a research partner that doesn't just regurgitate the same 'Japan is collectivist' nonsense. They went deep, got dirty, and delivered insights that moved the needle.
RiffRaff's ethnographic work in Tokyo gave us a window into consumer behavior that traditional surveys never could. They don't just report—they interpret.
We were about to launch a campaign that would have flopped. RiffRaff's street-level research saved us from an expensive mistake and gave us a better path forward.
